Message:
“I’m so glad you’re alive.”
Those were the words
that spilled from her lips
as I regained consciousness.

Her eyes are accepting of death,
her voice gentle.
Those words as the trigger,
I’m brought back to the moment
of my sister’s murder.

For the first time,
I could hear my sister’s words
over the sound of that gunshot.

Ahh, I remember now.
What my big sis said to me was...!

Why am I only remembering now?!
Why is she of all people
reminding me of my sister?!

“You’re an unfeeling
murderer, aren’t you?!
If you aren’t gonna
play the part,
what reason do I have
to despise you?!”

As I yelled this,
she even lowered
her eyes in remorse...

What am I supposed to do...?
How am I supposed to
avenge you now, Big Sis...?
